column4: how do i copy files from one remote location to another remote directory on the same server using gedit?
there seems to be no option
how do i copy files from one remote location to another remote directory on the same server using gftp?
i deal with command line ftp, prolly as simple as right click > copy, go to the new dir, right click > paste
problem is, there IS no copy, cut, or paste
could you direct me to the command line way of doing things?
cp and mv commands don't work.
sorry, it's ren for rename. and it works cross-directory. ren this /over/here/that
it may be mren -- check if that's a command.
are they all in the same directory? if so, try ren * /new/*
it's referring to the file wp* -- it doesn't see the * as a wildcard, gimme a sec, i will figure this out
im not even sure what else to try
